name: Grigory
text:
...Oh, welcome~
[Player]-kun~
Come on in, come on in~

It was Grigory's own room.
A cluttered space with development equipment scattered everywhere.

name: Grigory
text:
Wahahaha, sorry for the mess~
It's always like this whenever I start developing new models~

name: Grigory
text:
So~?
You said you had something to give me,
but what is it~?

name: Grigory
text: I'm hoping it's something sweet~

name: Grigory
text:
Wow, it's chocolate after all~
Ehehehe~
I love it too, I'm so happy~

Saying that,
Grigory opened the wrapping paper and
quickly began to eat the chocolate.

name: Grigory
text:
Mmm, it's very delicious~
It has an exceptional taste~
Grigory's expression was open and filled with pure joy.

name: Grigory
text:
...Hm, what's wrong?
You're making a quite a face.

name: Grigory
text:
You're asking if I
"know what day it is today"?
Of course, I know~

name: Grigory
text:
This is Valentine's chocolate~,
which [Player]-kun gave to me out of their feelings, right?

name: Grigory
text:
That's why—
I told you "I love it too," right~?
I'm very happy~

name: Grigory
text:
...Eh? You're asking
"if I really understand the meaning"?
Oh dear, that's really rude~

name: Grigory
text:
Do I really seem that dense~?
Hmm, I didn't notice~

name: Grigory
text:
For [Player]-kun to think that of me,
that's a bit... problematic, maybe...?

Grigory, who had been contemplating with his hand on his chin,
however, smiled and turned to face them.

name: Grigory
text:
Alright, then let's spend the whole day together~
Today is a perfect day to play at home~

name: Grigory
text:
Because today is the anniversary
of us formally expressing our feelings~
And...

Having said that,
Grigory gently brought his face closer to [Player]'s—

name: Grigory
text:
—That "I" perfectly understand the meaning.
I just have to prove it, yes~

His voice was whispered right by [Player]'s ear,
yet so clearly stated his intentions.

name: Grigory
text: Alright, then let's have a lot of fun today. [Player]-kun~

name: Grigory
text:
I'll make sure "you" understand what I mean perfectly~
It's alright, it's alright~

name: Grigory
text:
...A day is long, you know~
Just leave it to me~

Having said that,
Grigory happily took [Player]'s hand
and led them further into the room.
